main.name: Resume Boost
main.description: Pave your path in the direction you want and let us be THE RUDDER of your SHIP . . . . . . .
main.bio: We here at Resume Reviews believe that every person is unique and have a specific job only fit for them. Our goal is to help you build the perfect resume to land the perfect job.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers
